completeListOfAbilities.name: Shining Wave
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
2-hit ranged  PG attack +  PF attack
BRV damage increased based on total resistance value of party's active Shield effects
Greatly restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 10% of MAX HP
HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to BRV
Moderately increases SPD for 5 turns

passives.name: Shining Shield Extension
passives.desc:
Shining Shield use +2

When using Shining Shield:
 â€¢ Grants target 50% INT BRV before BRV multiplierã€? extended to party
 â€¢ Moderate boost to target's BRV multiplierã€? extended to party
 â€¢ Shield extended to party
 â€¢ MAX BRV Up extended to partyã€? becomes Will of Light (slightly raises ATK; BRV Regen effect)
 â€¢ Triggers additional  PF attack after use

While Will of Light active:
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ ( PG attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage)
 â€¢ HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on INT BRV before  PF attack)

While Will of Light active and party's total Shield count 3:
 â€¢ BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (moderate BRV damage boost)
 â€¢ HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (becomes melee  PG attack +  PF attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
passives.short_desc: Shining Shield Extension: Boost to Shining Shield

passives.name: Buffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRVã€? ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buffed Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRVã€? ATK

passives.name: Throw Buckler Extension
passives.desc:
When using Throw Buckler:
 â€¢ Grants party BRV based on own INT BRV before  PG attack
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 â€¢ Self: 5 turns Will of Light
 â€¢ Triggers additional  PF attack after use
passives.short_desc: Throw Buckler Extension: Boost to Throw Buckler
